message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $12,000.  I think it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $11,000. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $11,000. My maximum offer remains at $9,500. I hope we can find common ground.
